text: etenkilum stri tanre bharttavil ninn pinakkamea avagananayea bhayappettal avaran'yean'yam ottutirppuntakkunnatil kurramilla. ennalla; ottutirppan uttamam. manusyamanas's eppealum sankucitamayirikkum. ninnal nallanilayil kaliyukayum suksmata pularttukayumanenkil, orkkuka: allahu ninnal ceyyunnavayeakkeyum suksmamayi ariyunnavanan
